definitions.title: n.[f.]
definitions.body: reeling (Aramaism for [[חגה]] Ew:§ 173 b, by copyist's err. Di)—[[למחרים]]…[[וְהָֽיְתָה]] ´[[לח]] Is 19:17 and the land of Judah shall become to Egypt a reeling, i.e. Egypt shall reel in terror at the sight of it (‖[[יִפְחָָד]]; this mng. may either be fr. an orig. sense of [[חגג]], or = be excited as at a [[חָג]], cf. [[חנג]]
